name: Beyond the Long Night
storyline:
You wake in the Dark Mountain - a subterranean world full of monsters, secrets and loveable characters, all caught within a time loop. With no prior knowledge of who you are, a friendly guitarist tasks you with escaping the Dark Mountain to reach the Overworld beyond.

What lies ahead is a frantic journey through the underground kingdom as you try to escape a deadly storm that rips through the mountain chambers.
summary: Beyond the Long Night is a whimsical and chaotic twin-stick shooting roguelike adventure! Explore The Dark Mountain - a subterranean world full of monsters, secrets and lovable characters. Puzzle, upgrade and battle through three randomly generated areas to outrun a deadly storm and escape to the Overworld beyond. Uncover a trail of mysteries in this ancient kingdom of demigods and explorers, captured within an endless time loop.
